name: Finger Car Driver Dash
description:
Drive & steer sharp with one tap of finger!

No complex controls to drive the car just tap left or right. It’s the most amazing experience of driving. Be aware of sudden twists & turns or you will lose your game.

Enjoy the ultimate experience of driving in career & endless mode. Collect as much coins as you can & unlock the new exciting variety of cars to play with. Its time to become a car rider on never ending twisty tracks.

Excellent & challenging episode, lets see how far you will go?

Adventure Drive - One Tap Driving Game Features:
• Amazing colorful HD graphics.
• Infinite twisty track endless & career mode.
• Single finger tap game.
• Best time killing game.
• Variety of cars to play with.
• Addictive and challenging gameplay.
• Realistic sound effects.
